{{Not to be confused with|Mob|NPC (DLC)|image-size=64px}}
A '''mob''' (short for '''mobile''', '''mobile entity''', or '''mobile object''')<ref>{{w|Mob (video games)}} or a single entity in a group when referring to ''Minecraft''.</ref> is an AI-driven game [[entity]] appearing in [[add-on]]s and certain [[World (downloadable content)|worlds]]. All mobs are made using an [[API]], typically designed around the [[Marketplace]], and often with traits taken from existing [[mobs]] in the [[Minecraft|main game]].
